branchCategory.name: XSA, NC Type, Straight Solenoid Valve
branchCategory.description: Series XSA is a normally closed solenoid valve suitable for air or inert gas in high vacuum applications.  This valve functions properly at an operating pressure as low as 1x10<SUP>-6</SUP> Pa(absolute).  Face Seal and compression fitting options offer extremely low levels of internal and external leakage.  Two DC and eight AC voltage options are available, paired with multiple electrical entry styles.

breadCrumb.name: XSA, NC Type, Straight Solenoid Valve
